answers.answer: Yes it does work but u are to early to take caster oil it don't make u feel any different just make u contract and dilate u take caster oil at 38 weeks because they won't induce u until then

I'm being induced at 36 weeks due to a big baby as I have gestational diabetes and I have all them symptoms too they can induce b4 38 weeks but I wouldn't reccomend as it's added stress I'm constantly worried my lil boy won't be fully developed :( xx

question: Im beyond tired and 3 weeks ago my baby was 6lbs5oz...im now 36+6 and I go to the dr tomorrow..my hip gives out on me and sleep what is that,leg cramps and back aches..I have dilated to 1cm and cervix is soft that was 3weeks ago...I have been having the braxton hicks and sharp pains in my pelvic area and they hurt...have you ladies tried the castor oil and if so what does it do and how does it make you feel?
title: Does the castor oil work
